import React from 'react' import styled from 'styled-components' import { ContainerCustom, ContentBlock, ContentBlockBackground, MainContent, Section, SectionRow, ContainerCustomTokenListSections,ItemListSection, ItemSelectionSection } from '../components/base/base' import { TokensList } from '../components/TokensList/TokensList' import { ItemSelection } from '../components/ItemSelection/ItemSelection' import { Title, DomainTitle } from '../typography/Title' import { AccountButton } from '../components/account/AccountButton' import { DomainSelectBoxContainer } from '../components/base/base' import { DomainTitleContainer } from '../components/base/base' import { useEthers } from '@usedapp/core' import { useBadgeList } from '../portalHooks/useBadgeList' import { Badge } from '../portalHooks/BadgeHelperTypes' import {Form} from 'react-bootstrap' export function Tokens() { const { chainId, account, library } = useEthers(); const badges: Badge[]| undefined = useBadgeList(account); return ( {/* Meta Portal */}

Badges based on on-chain activity

 {badges ? (badges.length * 10): 0} XP
) } const ItemsContentBlock = styled(ContentBlock)` overflow: scroll; min-width: max-content; ` const SignerXp = styled.p` font-size:18px; `
